title: Businessweek Extra - John Hritz, JSW Steel USA CEO
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - John Hritz, JSW Steel USA CEO
description:
John Hritz, president and chief executive officer of JSW Steel USA Inc., was a huge backer of President Trump’s plan to impose tariffs on steel and aluminum imports. Now he is suing the administration. Hirtz speaks with "Bloomberg Businessweek" hosts Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
John Hritz, president and chief executive officer of JSW Steel USA Inc., was a huge backer of President Trump’s plan to impose tariffs on steel and aluminum imports. Now he is suing the administration. Hirtz speaks with "Bloomberg Businessweek" hosts Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.
